title: 3 bedroom brand new apartment for sale in Elements from a higher floor Rajagiriya
details:
3 bedroom brand new apartment for sale in Elements from a higher floor in Buthgamuwa Rajagiriya.

1700 sqft area spasiuse apartment has a large terrace area which opens to the lush greenery and Adams peak view.

Large living, dining pantry, servants room and bathroom

Common facilities

Full length swimming Pool
Kiddies pool
Gym
Banquet hall
Lounge
Meeting rooms
Common drivers rooms
Expected price LKR 46 million
